definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: The modern pentathlon was added to the Olympic program.
sentences.chinese: 現代五項全能被加入到奧運會設項之中。

sentences.english: Listen. What's the modern five events?
sentences.chinese: 你聽好了，現代五項是什麼？

sentences.english: When was modern pentathlon introduced to the Olympic Games?
sentences.chinese: 現代五項是何時成爲奧運會比賽項目的？

sentences.english: Modern pentathlon became an Olympic event in 1912.
sentences.chinese: 現代五項在1912年被列爲奧運會項目。

sentences.english: But the incidence is especially high in case of modern pentathlon.
sentences.chinese: 但現代五項出現這種問題的概率尤其高。

sentences.english: So, legend has it, was born the modern pentathlon.
sentences.chinese: 這就是傳說中現代五項全能運動的起源。
